strings.Value: "Did you see that goblin king's wolf? That was one impressive beast!"
"Hm... The beast's hide would make a luxurious carpet! Too bad I have no place to put it, or I'd think very carefully on the matter..."
"I wonder about its favorite food. Disobedient relatives, perhaps?"
"I haven't the slightest idea how the goblins tame them! Where did they get the sense to do it? One can only imagine it was some sort of divine intervention..."
"Great beast all right! A Hero should ride it, not some shatshank like goblin king!"
